idea:
Isha Consult (https://ishaconsult.com/) is a Mumbai based Management Consulting firm offering its Consulting Services to Corporates, Startups & MSME’s. With our hands-on experience, we bring a positive difference in the way your business is conducted & turnaround struggling businesses into profit-making and a process-driven organisation with cost-effective solutions.


Business environments today have become more complicated, sophisticated, and uncertain. It now requires ever-expanding understanding, strength, and leadership. We utilize our experience & knowledge to ensure that our client’s projects, regardless of how challenging or complex, are successfully managed and completed on time.


We partner with our clients to provide leadership, advice, assistance, support, resources required to improve their operational, financial, and strategic performance. These are in turn shall be driven through deep insights using data analytics, review of business issues & challenges and give a presentation of options for overcoming them and development of plans for catalyzing change and improvement.


With our knowledge and experience, we can positively impact your strategic efforts, people, and organizations in a meaningful and sustainable way.
name: ISHA ONE COACH CONSULT LLP

idea:
We at HealthySure, are building an employee-focused InsurTech platform that would reimagine health protection in India by converging health security and health management for corporate employees.


We are starting our journey with a unique, industry-first unified health insurance wherein the employer will buy a base health insurance plan which can be upgraded by employees as per their needs and preferences just by paying an additional premium. Not just that, this policy can be continued to be held by the employees even post-employment thus eliminating the need of buying an independent personal cover. This model solves the problem of duplication that currently exists between corporate and personal health insurance and also acts as a smart growth hack for insurers to tap into lifelong renewal clients by capturing the universe of employees through group health insurance.


In Phase 2, once we have the captive user base of employees, we will expand the platform to cover concierge services (hospital selection advisory, second medical opinion, claim management etc.) to building a self-care app (health check-ups, monitoring daily vitals, personalized health management programs, eye/dental collaborations, tele consultations etc.). We will also provide other forms of insurances such as travel insurance, accident insurance and life insurance on-demand basis to the employees.

--

HealthySure

Reimagining Employee Benefits

www.healthysure.in
name: HealthySure
